I am pleased today to put a five-star rating plate on the entrance of IDA in Al Barsha as the best governmental center in providing services and customer satisfaction http://t.co/COjWcKRDRT
The UAE is the only one in the world to classify its government centers by star rating for the hotel sector because those who visit government headquarters are our guests and deserve the best

We have more than 30 million references and 150 million transactions annually through our service centers and we categorize them all because reviewers have the right to know the quality of service in our centers
We also announced today the results of the classification of all centers at the level of the state with all transparency .. All congratulations to the centers of excellence .. http://t.co/XWUpSzzBnt
We promised people two years ago that our government centers will be the private sector and today the star rating system is the best internationally in this field http://t.co/Tc2p5MSSVC
